name: Evolved Bunny Berserker Helm
description: Take on the guise of this berserking bunny and hop double-time to find those hidden eggs before the Grenwogs do! Find the Magical Marshmallow Cheep, the Gold-Foil Chocolate Bunny, and the Basketful of Dyed Eggs dropping off of the the bosses in Greenguard Forest and use them in Cabdury's merge shop.
